bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Physiological Notion of flourishing qi dynamics. Su wen 素問 53: 穀盛氣盛，穀虛氣虛，此其常也 , “When the grain abounds, the qi abounds ; when the grain is depleted, the qi is depleted. That is the regular [association]”.

② Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism of an abundance of pathological qi, or the qi dynamic being blocked or moving disorderly contrary to its regular direction. Su wen 素問 46: 夫氣盛血聚者， 宜石而瀉之 , “Now, when the qi abounds and blood has collected, one must drain it with a [sharpened] stone”.
